message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to invest in something that will benefit your business. I'm willing to offer you the product for $12,000. This is a great starting point, and I'm open to negotiations.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your enthusiasm, $12,000 is outside my budget. I'm interested in this product, but I can only go up to $8,500. Let me know if you're willing to work with me on that.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $10,500. This is a fair compromise, considering the value the product brings to your business.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm confident that we can reach a mutually agreeable price. I'm willing to offer $9,000 for the product.  This is a fair price, and I hope we can finalize the deal.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer the product for $10,000. This is still a great value for the product, and I believe it's worth considering.

Alice, I appreciate you trying to meet me halfway, but $10,000 is still a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,500. This is my final offer, and I hope we can close the deal. If this isn't acceptable, I'll have to explore other options.

I understand that you're trying to be firm on your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,500. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product for $9,800. This is a very competitive price, and I think it's worth considering.
